member.name: D3D12_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION
member.summary: Associates a subobject defined directly in a state object with shader exports.

member.name: D3D12_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION.pSubobjectToAssociate
member.summary: Pointer to the subobject in current state object to define an association to.

member.name: D3D12_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION.NumExports
member.summary: Size of the pExports array. If 0, this is being explicitly defined as a default association. Another way to define a default association is to omit this subobject association for that subobject completely.

member.name: D3D12_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION.pExports
member.summary: The array of exports with which the subobject is associated.
